action.action-desc: Mrs. Spartz introduced the following bill; which was referred to the Committee on Energy and Commerce

form.official-title: To amend the Clean Air Act to exempt nonroad engines and vehicles that are used for agricultural purposes from the emission standards of that Act, and for other purposes.

section.text: This Act may be cited as the Farm Equipment Safety Act.

section.header: Exemption of nonroad farm engines and vehicles from Clean Air Act emission standards
section.text: Section 213 of the Clean Air Act (42 U.S.C. 7547) is amended by adding at the end the following:

subsection.text: The standards under this section do not apply to emissions from nonroad engines and nonroad vehicles that are used for agricultural purposes.
